chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 has the above problem:
The scratches are clearly visible from a further distance. We would like to keep the device, please suggest a proposal for depreciation. Thank you
Thank you very much for your help,

Dear ecomobile

The costumer has encountered the following problem with his item: scratches and dents (please take a look at the pictures).

The customer would like a partial refund of 60€

This is the amount pre-defined at QC for the difference between ‘Very Good’ and ‘Good’.

For information purposes only. We will take care of the partial refund.

Regards,
Mario from the Back Care Team
